Package org.firebirdsql.gds

Interface BatchParameterBuffer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Parameter>, ParameterBuffer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatchParameterBufferImp
    public interface BatchParameterBuffer
extends ParameterBuffer
    Represents a batch parameter buffer, for Firebird 4 and higher batch configuration.
